html:
2.1.23  5:23 pm   on 1.27.16 9:16pm  in the reality tab you said that you were starting to like the idea of doing a full album. has this idea been appealing to you recently?

     no. since then i looked into the idea, and i figured out that what i was craving was not actually an album. it would be something much better. which i am still craving, stronger now than ever before

2.1.23  4:58 pm   Why isn't "i don't wanna go to school" listed on this website's songs page?

      it is, and it's called "school"

2.1.23  4:02 pm   What would you say to someone who is feeling really hopeless and thinks nothing will ever change?

      i hope you're ready for the change

2.1.23  3:47 pm   we know about the land of the two-letter words, but how is the land of the four-letter words?

      nice. good. very cool, just like......this

2.1.23  2:31 pm   do you have any life changing advice

      sure, but first i need to know what your life is like, so i can recommend something different

2.1.23  1:39 pm   does the effort put into an art piece at all affect its worth (in your opinion)

      sure. effort and non-effort can both have effects on a piece of work. also, effort and non-effort can sometimes have no effect. what gives a piece of art its worth, is not entirely possible to know or predict. sometimes it's obvious. sometimes it's magic

2.1.23  1:05 pm   if you do sleep, how are you answering questions at 3 in the morning?

      you actually don't know what time i answer the questions because the time i answer the questions is not listed. the current time i am answering this question happens to be Thursday, February 2, 2023 2:46:14 AM, so it seems you are almost correct by accident in this case, but nonetheless, to answer your question about how is it possible to sleep and also answer a question at 3am, the answer is simple: is to sleep at a different time, other than 3am. for example: 6am, 9am, 1pm, those are all times when i was asleep, during the most recent 24 hour period. Now i have a follow up question for you which is, if you sleep, then how are you asking a question at 1:05pm

2.1.23  12:26 pm   How do you know when the knowledge you know is not known to the unknown 

      it's not

2.1.23  11:33 am   could you talk about some of your observations regarding humour?

      humour is when you open something that wasn't even a door, or wasn't even there

2.1.23  9:46 am   What is your favorite video you have made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.1.23  9:10 am   I got a really bad overall grade in school. do you have some advice?

      do something else that's good

2.1.23  8:50 am   if worms could talk, what would they say?

      what would you say, if you could talk

2.1.23  5:56 am   if you put a bagel on itself will it crash the universe

      no, it will just crash the bagel

2.1.23  4:54 am   what is music

      a hypnosis tool, used for propaganda enhancement

2.1.23  4:20 am   how to be cool

      just stand next to a doorway. it works every time





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

1.31.23  10:22 pm   Which came first for you, the dream or the vision

      actually it started with a chicken, followed by an egg,

1.31.23  9:47 pm   did you intend on making your video titled "Perfect" funny?

      no, but i didn't exactly intend not to either

1.31.23  7:40 pm   Why do I keep doing the wrong thing if I know that it is wrong?

     it must also be right in some ways, at least for you

     do I need to know it harder or something?

      maybe you could start to explain in more detail what's right and wrong about it

1.31.23  7:01 pm   Is land a conspiracy committed by real estate agents to sell houses?

      no. they are just capitalizing on what's already there

1.31.23  5:43 pm   what do you think of drop D tuning?

     pretty good

      the songs associated with it are super heavy rock songs but when i mess around with it i end up playing in major scales because the major sixth is so easy to access.

     i always liked the barred sus2 that's available. what the heck, sus2maj7 is available as a barred chord. it must be christmas morning

1.31.23  5:27 pm   how do you escape the sense of being lazy and unmotivated when you feel you're on the cusp of greatness?

      first just sit around and bask in the fantasy of greatness. then realize that you can build a linear path of very sequential steps in the direction toward that greatness. each step unlocks the next. now you can have a nice little unlocking party each day

1.31.23  3:05 pm   how much water is acceptable for an ocean?

      that makes me wonder what you would do if you did not accept the amount there was

1.31.23  1:58 pm   is revenge ever the answer?

      sometimes in the movies

1.31.23  1:54 pm   you think my fingers could grow more fingers?

      not without going deeper into the labratory than you've ever gone before

1.31.23  12:50 pm   when did you start making music?

      i don't recall

1.31.23  12:43 pm   is it true that your songs secretly have really sad meanings? 

      no

1.31.23  12:01 pm   all the lyrics I write sound too generic. how do i spice it up

      lyrics actually have no sound. if you've performed or sung them out loud, then it's worth looking at the rhythmic/musical quality of how you are saying/singing those lyrics, just as much as what actual words you're using. when one changes, the other changes. they both work together. but if you want to go somewhere different i'd recommend starting from a place that you thought you're never supposed to be. like, i dunno, a mine shaft or something. see if you can songwrite yourself out of a mineshaft. or maybe a Lenscrafters

1.31.23  9:39 am   Hey Bill, are nightmares real, or are they just misunderstood dreams?

      they are real like stories. which, ... now that i think of it, are misunderstood dreams

1.31.23  7:18 am   here's what i don't get about the theory that "the universe is a simulation"... if our universe is a simulation, that means that there must be a universe that runs this simulation. If there isn't one, and this "simulation" just exists on its own somehow, that would mean the distinction between "real" and "simulation" would be completely arbitrary. so there's another universe that runs this one. but if that's the case, that universe would be the "real" one, and you still run into the same issues that the simulation theory is trying to solve, because how did that universe come into being? is it ALSO a simulation? what about the universe controlling that simulation? you can't just keep going on infinitely, eventually you have to come across the "original" universe. but anyway... what are your thoughts on this

      i wonder what it would be a simulation of. if it's just a simulation of itself, then, that, i would argue, is the real thing. like if someone met you and said "hey you look just like you. you remind me of you" you'd say "that's right idiot, i AM me"

1.31.23  5:37 am   thoughts on potatoes?

      absolutely wild flavor, to match its wild color

1.31.23  12:17 am   is a coconut a mammal? it seems to me that they are, as I went through a very sciency conclusion to get there. 

      need at least 2 coconuts

1.30.23  10:14 pm   Favorite sport?

      got to be either soft ball or hard ball

1.30.23  9:17 pm   Is it true you live on Earth

     yes

     I don't think it is

     well in that case i respect your opinion

1.30.23  8:07 pm   how to make friends?

      it's you. you must be the friend

1.30.23  8:07 pm   I've been thinking, bravery isn't the absence of fear, but rather the ability to face those fears. So would that mean that perfection isn't the the absence of flaws, but rather the ability to shine on despite those flaws

      it seems to me that perfection is probably a moment of hypnosis, where things are going so great that you think that this is *the* right way

1.30.23  7:58 pm   Is it possible to hold something without touching it?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.30.23  7:20 pm   What should I do if I have too many interests/passions and I can't decide which thing I should pursue in or make a hobby out of?

      start by writing them all down. just to see what you're working with. that will increase the chances that one of them will end up at the top of the list, at least for now

1.30.23  6:15 pm   People can't control their own feelings. Is it similarly impossible to control one's own thoughts?

      almost

1.30.23  6:01 pm   What can I do to better enjoy working with people I don't enjoying working with? I've already identified that I'm not the problem in this scenario.

      in that case, maybe you should try being the problem

1.30.23  5:27 pm   What should I think about?

      everything

1.30.23  5:18 pm   is your next video a 6ish minute stunt reel you may or may not have said something about

      no

1.30.23  4:50 pm   whats some good genuine life advice you can share

      to be genuine with it i must first know which life you have. without knowing that, all i can say is step 1 get born, step 2 don't die at least not yet

1.30.23  11:51 am   What draws you to surrealism?

      maybe if realism isn't enough to get the job done. and the same would be true the other way around

1.30.23  11:27 am   The hardest part of a project is starting it and deciding where to end it. Would you agree?

      maybe

1.30.23  11:03 am   I think it's kind of interesting how your song When I Get Older is in 3/4 (unless you think of it as 6/4?) but doesn't have that "waltz feel" that a lot of other 3/4 songs do (A lot of country and folk songs come to mind). Like, I didn't even notice it was in 3 on my first listen. Do you have any thoughts or insight as to why this might be?

     slower tempo. with each of the 3 parts being subdivided into 4 (16th notes) at a comfortable speed. i'm pretty sure none of the 'waltz' type songs you're thinking of are slow enough to be divided up that way

     And (bonus question) can you think of any other songs that are sneakily in 3/4? 

      i don't consider it sneaky, but how about 'strong enough' by sheryl crow.

1.30.23  10:08 am   1.29.23  5:17 am yeah it does, it lands on the one at the same time as 'world' in 'and I'm dreaming of a brand new world', maybe I should have said two bars later not one bar later sorry

      it's not there, but you're gonna make me open it up and prove it. the flute has absolutely zero notes or sound after the end of bar 15 (where the riff is). but here are some audio clips to investigate whatever you actually are hearing, on the & of 4 ('world') in bar 16. (and for those of you counting along at home, the song starts on bar 2, with the pickup "i'm" being at the end of bar 1).
      so here is 6 beats starting from the top of the bar "dreaming of a brand new world", as is in the final mix: frontdoorbar16. And here is the same exact time range with the vocal muted: frontdoorbar16novoc. (i can already tell it's gonna be the rhodes). And here is the exact same time range with the drums and bass also muted: frontdoorbar16nodrbass. Here is just the "world" moment, with voc, drums, and bass muted: frontdoorworldnodrbass. it's getting more and more obvious, i think, that the only culprit here for what you've been hearing is the rhodes chord because it's the only thing playing that note at that time. but i'll give you each of the 3 instruments here individually anyway. Here is the bell, here is the pluck, (which, as can be heard in the other clips, is playing an E note at the moment in question. the 'D' note played in the pluck doesn't occur until the second 16th note of bar 17) And finally, here is the rhodes, which is playing an Asus4 chord, which of course includes the D note, which, while having absolutely nothing to do with the flute riff in the previous bar, is the only plausible explanation for what sound you're hearing here. And, just for the heck of it, here is the vocal for the word 'world', just in case there might be some resonance in there that's doing it

1.30.23  9:58 am   why did there use to be a song at the bottom of your songs page titled "y2k or whatever?"

      never was. there is (and still is) an item at the bottom of the expert page that says that. it's not a song, it's not a video, it's not a piece of media. it's just that line of text. it's a reference to january 1, 2000, as a sort of bookend to everything posted on the site which for some reason seems to be all later than that

1.30.23  9:10 am   Do you post your thoughts in your videos and notes as part of some sort of mental release? or do you just like doing it?

      both, and much more

1.30.23  7:49 am   what happens if you put everything on a bagel

      you'd be putting the bagel on itself

1.30.23  5:34 am   what is you favourite joke or riddle?

      the truth
